EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now for Tricentis Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<!--
-->
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Accelerate 2015 October 22nd, 2015 9 a.m. – 10 p.m. Vienna, Austria Register now, free of charge!
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Registration for Tricentis Accelerate 2015 <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> is now open! Join us for an inspiring day full of seminars, workshops and networking.
This year you will hear from experts on test automation, service virtualization, mobile testing as well as Tricentis’ own experts on agile and devops testing.
We look forward to meeting you in Vienna.
Best Regards,
The Tricentis Events Team
PS: Highlights from Accelerate 2014 can be found here <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate>.
